title: Missy Bevers Murder Probe - New Person of Interest
itunes:title: Missy Bevers Murder Probe - New Person of Interest
description:
Police and relatives have gone silent nine months after the unsolved murder of Midlothian, Texas, mom Missy Bevers. Sources tell CrimeOnline.com a new "person of interest" in the brutal beating of the fitness trainer case is linked to law enforcement. Knowing the person who used a hammer to kill Bevers in a church is still free is causing fear in the small Texas community. Nancy Grace and Alan Duke explore the latest.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
